data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Nong Khai do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nong Khai, Thailand
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Nong Khai, Thailand.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary: On average, 80 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Nong Khai, Thailand.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, teach the 6,075 believers in Nong Khai that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 6,075 believers in Nong Khai to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the South Asian, Bengali-speaking people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 6,075 believers living in the state of Nong Khai. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Nong Khai access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Nong Khai, Thailand.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

location.name: Nong Khai
location.cities_list: Vientiane, Nong Khai, Tha Bo, Phon Charoen, Si Chiang Mai
location.cities_list_w_pop: Vientiane (196,731), Nong Khai (63,609), Tha Bo (35,292), Phon Charoen (15,208), Si Chiang Mai (14,068)
